title: Saint Snow 1st GIG ~Welcome to Dazzling White Town~
description: is Saint Snow's first solo live. It took place at Pia Arena MM in Yokohama on October 17 & 18, 2020 and at Makomanai Ice Arena in Sapporo on November 7 & 8, 2020.
